name: get_autocomplete
description: Get auto complete suggestions by term or phrase. In terms of Finance.

q.description: Any familiar term or phrase to get auto complete suggestions.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_quotes
description: Get quotes by symbols. In terms of Finance.

symbols.description: The value of symbol field returned in …/auto-complete endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple entities.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_summary
description: Get live summary information of market by region. In terms of Finance.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_tickers_by_quote_type
description: Get tickers grouped by quote types. In terms of Finance.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_spark
description: Used with …/market/get-trending-tickers endpoint together to draw brief chart. In terms of Finance.

symbols.description: The value of symbol field returned in …/auto-complete endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple entities.

range.description: Allowed values are (1d | 5d | 3mo | 6mo | 1y | 5y | max). Default is 1d.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_earnings
description: Get recent earnings in the market. In terms of Finance.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

size.description: Number of items returned (up to 100). Default is 10.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_trending_tickers
description: Get latest trending tickers in the market. In terms of Finance.

region.description: One of the following is allowed: US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG. Default is US.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_popular_watchlists
description: Get popular watchlists in the market. In terms of Finance.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
